    • Method Summary

      All Methods Instance Methods Concrete Methods 
      Modifier and Type Method Description
      void advanceShift​(boolean attended)
      This method allow to advance a shift of the current shift, only can advance if the next shift already has been assigned
      void assignShift​(java.lang.String documentNumber, java.lang.String documentType)
      this method allow assign a instance of Shift to a user through their identity document number (the turn is formed by a letter of the alphabet and a number from 0 to 99, which go from lowest to highest always and once it goes from 99 it returns to 00 and the letter increases) taking into account if the user does not have any turn over the current shift.
      Shift generateNextShift()
      This method allows to generate the next turn corresponding to the list of assigned shifts (UserShift), the method will take the last assigned turn and increase it by one, to return the result

      java.util.ArrayList<User> getUserList()  
      java.util.ArrayList<User> getUserShift()

      This method allow to create a new User and to add in the list of Users, only can be add if the id and type of the user does'nt exist otherwise it will throw an exception
      java.lang.String searchUser​(java.lang.String documentNumber, java.lang.String documentType)
      This method allows you to search for a user's information to return it in a string of characters, the method searches for the user in the list of users and in case it is not found, throw an exception

    • Method Detail

      • getUserShift

        public java.util.ArrayList<User> getUserShift()

      • searchUser

        public java.lang.String searchUser​(java.lang.String documentNumber,
                                   java.lang.String documentType)
                            throws UserNoExistException
        This method allows you to search for a user's information to return it in a string of characters, the method searches for the user in the list of users and in case it is not found, throw an exception
        Parameters:
        documentNumber - this parameter is a String that represents the number of the user's document to look for
        documentType - this parameter us a String that represents the type of document that have the user to look for, this parameter only can have the following options: citizenship card, civil registration,passport,foreign identity card
        Returns:
        this method return a String that represent the information of the User to look for, the information has been save in a method toString() that exist in the User class.
        Throws:
        UserNoExistException - This exception will be thrown when the user to search does not succeed

      • assignShift

        public void assignShift​(java.lang.String documentNumber,
                        java.lang.String documentType)
                 throws UserAlreadyHasShiftException
        this method allow assign a instance of Shift to a user through their identity document number (the turn is formed by a letter of the alphabet and a number from 0 to 99, which go from lowest to highest always and once it goes from 99 it returns to 00 and the letter increases) taking into account if the user does not have any turn over the current shift.
        Parameters:
        documentNumber - this parameter is a String that represents the number of the user's document to assign shift
        documentType - this parameter us a String that represents the type of document that have the user to assign shift, this parameter only can have the following options: citizenship card, civil registration,passport,foreign identity card
        Throws:
        UserAlreadyHasShiftException - this exception will be thrown when the user to assign a shift already have a shift assigned over the current shift

      • generateNextShift

        public Shift generateNextShift()
        This method allows to generate the next turn corresponding to the list of assigned shifts (UserShift), the method will take the last assigned turn and increase it by one, to return the result
        Returns:
        this method returns an instance of the Shift class, this represent to the next of the list

      • registerUser

        public void registerUser​(java.lang.String name,
                         java.lang.String lastName,
                         java.lang.String documentType,
                         java.lang.String documentNumber,
                         java.lang.String locate,
                         java.lang.String numberPhone)
                  throws IdUserExistException,
                         ValueIsEmptyException
        This method allow to create a new User and to add in the list of Users, only can be add if the id and type of the user does'nt exist otherwise it will throw an exception
        Parameters:
        name - this parameter is a String that represent the name of the User
        lastName - this parameter is a String that represent the last name of the User
        documentType - this parameter is a String that represent the document of the User, this parameter only can be: citizenship card, civil registration,passport,foreign identity card
        documentNumber - this parameter is a String that represent the document Number of the User
        locate - this parameter is a String that represent the locate of the User, this parameter does'nt obligatory so if this parameter is empty will be "unknown"
        numberPhone - this parameter is a String that represent the number phone of the User, this parameter does'nt obligatory so if this parameter is empty will be "unknown"
        Throws:
        IdUserExistException - this exception will be throw if already exist a user whit the same id and type id in the users list
        ValueIsEmptyException - this exception will be throw if any of the following parameters is empty: name, lastName, documentType and documentNumber.

      • advanceShift

        public void advanceShift​(boolean attended)
                  throws NoMoreShiftException
        This method allow to advance a shift of the current shift, only can advance if the next shift already has been assigned
        Parameters:
        attended - this parameter is a boolean and represent if the user was attended or was absent.
        Throws:
        NoMoreShiftException - this exception will be throw when don't exist more shift to continue
